text:
This is a disgrace. #Covid19 shouldn’t an excuse for a privatised testing regime. 

This outsourcing has seen delays at ‘lighthouse labs’ in processing & data kept from local councils & GPs

This money should go into building up NHS labs & infrastructure. https://t.co/zyDxSFlnc8
